name: Inselstaat
declaringWar: You will drown in the waves of death!
attacked: You got off the wrong foot, in the depths of the seas, all your hopes will drown!
introduction: You people look weak, the sea hates the weak!
hateHello: Let's see what ya got for me.
tradeRequest: You should accept, otherwise, well I dont know.
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
uniqueText: Units will have the Power to cross all kind of seas. The gifts of the Seas strengthen their cities.

name: Loewenland
declaringWar: You feared me, but now your nightmares becomes Reality!
defeated: The pride of a Lion does not vanish in defeat!
uniqueText: Land units get Predator Promotion. Killing enemy units grants bonus gold, culture and science.

name: The Forgotten Hords
declaringWar: The Void inside your heart is your greatest enemy.
introduction: Centuries ago we were banished, we were forgotten, but know we return for our last revenge, our Hunger and Wrath is greater than you can imagine.
neutralHello: May the Wind bless your fields stranger
tradeRequest: A man is only as strong as his heart tells him to be, so sometimes you have to beat your heart.
uniqueText: The Forgotten dissect the corpses of their foes to get science, their ruined eyes provide more vision for Land units.

name: South Shadow Isles
declaringWar: May our blades give you a last rest.
introduction: We were betrayed, power destroys a soiety, but we got back up, and now we are strong in our new home again!

name: Baerenland
declaringWar: You'd like some honey? Well Imma give ya steel.
attacked: Im bigger than you im stronger! Where comes the courage? Your going to the graveyard boy.
defeated: The forest is still, and peacefull, but it never forgets.
introduction: My gates are open for your trades!
neutralHello: Hello old friend, ya know, lets keep this business going
hateHello: Are you gettin serious now, like a real business man, or are you gonna stay that ignorant kind of not grown up kid?
tradeRequest: My trades are fair, if you do not accept, I get a new partner
uniques: [+1 Science] from [Forest] tiles [in all cities]<starting from the [Renaissance era]>
[+2 Gold] [in all cities connected to capital]
[+2 Production] [in all cities connected to capital]
Worker can build [all] improvements on [Forest] tiles
